Name: Grimmace
AboutMe:
Hidden Worlds

My most recent project is live on Kickstarter. It is an Augmented Reality children's book, and a super fun adventure all around. www.kickstarter.com/projects/1223734313/goodnight-lad-childrens-book-and-interactive-3d-ap

HireVue

I am the lead Android Developer for HireVue. I have taken their Android app from a 2.5 star rating (when I started) to a 4-star rating in under 4 months.

Giveway Games

I also do a lot of fun Android projects on the side. I have 7 apps in the store, a few in the process of being complete, and over 4 million downloads with mostly favorable reviews.

Interests

My interests (other than Android) include Image Processing, Graphics, Machine Learning, and designing really nifty apps.
